original: Blomquist, Anders Paul, hovpredikant, kyrkoherde, Jönköping, f. 24/8/ 86 i Jönköp. av kontxhef Carl Petrus B. o. Jenny Ehsabet Hellstrand. G. 16 m. Märta Johansson. Barn: Per f. 17, Hans 19, Bengt 20, Inge 23. — Mogiex. 07, teol. fil. ex. 09, teol. kand. o. prästv. 12. Pastorsadj. i Jönköp. 12, pastorsadj. 15-21, las :pred. 15-35, kommin. i Sofia församl. i Jönköp. 21, kyrkoh. där sed. 33, reg:pais’tor v. Jönköp. reg. 24-26, tjg. e. o. hov-pred. Led. av lokaLslyr. f. Jönköp. h. a. 1., insp. f. prakt, melllansk. Skr.: upps. i tidn. o. tidskr. LVO.
translated: Blomquist, Anders Paul, court chaplain, pastor, Jönköping, b. 24/8/86 in Jönköping. Son of district manager Carl Petrus B. and Jenny Elisabet Hellstrand. Married on 16/xx (year unknown) to Märta Johansson. Children: Per b. 17, Hans b. 19, Bengt b. 20, Inge b. 23. Completed his degree in philosophy in 1907, and theology in 1909. Ordained as a priest in 1912. Served as pastorsadj. in Jönköping in 1912 and then again from 1915-1921. Was a chaplain from 1915-1935 and then became a minister in the Sofia parish in Jönköping in 1921. Became pastor there in 1933 and served as royal court chaplain from 1924-1926. He also served as a member of the local council in Jönköping. Inspector for practical training in intermediate school. Wrote articles in newspapers and journals and was awarded the LVO.

structured.name: Anders Paul Blomquist
structured.article: Wrote articles in newspapers and journals
